prompt: Identify the dominant control primitive and whether abstraction is present.
expected_action: Label each stem with {sequence|selection|iteration} and abstraction yes/no.
evaluation_rule: Correct primitive identified; abstraction marked only if a clear boundary exists.

items.stem: Read two numbers and print their sum.
If input is invalid, show an error; otherwise continue.
Repeat input until it satisfies a condition.
Call a helper function and branch on its return value.
